body_html:
I think the problem would be resolved by doing as follows, since I remember having to do something similar:

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf
cd tensorflow
git submodule init
git config submodule.google/protobuf.url ../protobuf
git submodule update
body_text:
I think the problem would be resolved by doing as follows, since I remember having to do something similar:
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf
cd tensorflow
git submodule init
git config submodule.google/protobuf.url ../protobuf
git submodule update
body:
I think the problem would be resolved by doing as follows, since I remember having to do something similar:

```
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
git clone https://github.com/google/protobuf
cd tensorflow
git submodule init
git config submodule.google/protobuf.url ../protobuf
git submodule update
```
